data.text: Ngʼadna bura makare, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Nona kendo itema, yaye Jehova Nyasaye
nikech herani osiko kanie chunya kinde duto,
Ok abed piny gi joma wuondore
Achayo chokruok mar joma timo gik maricho
Aluoko lwetena kanyisogo ni aonge ketho,
ka alando pakni gi dwol maduongʼ,
Ahero hekalu kama idakie, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Kik ikaw chunya kaachiel gi joricho, kik ikaw ngimana
